Text: Aggie AnnouncementsHowdy Ags Here are a few announcements and some information we thought you might find useful as the holidays get close Aggie Yell Practice and a PreYell Party will be held at the Sam Houston Race Park on Thursday December The preyell party includes a concert performance by Roger Creager For more information click here whatsnewagreceptionhtml Franklin Covey has introduced a new line of Aggie planners They include great photos from Aggieland and lots of fun Aggie trivia For information or to order click here texasam Send a special holiday message to our men and women in the military many of them Texas Aggies defending American freedom worldwide Concerns about mail delivery have prompted the military to suspend this years letterwriting campaign However the United States military is providing this private and secure online resource that will allow you to share your special holiday message We thought Aggies might enjoy participating To send your message click here The Association of Former Students wishes you a happy and safe holiday season and lots of good bull in
